system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision directory dialog." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2013-01-17 15:11:05 -0800 (Thu, 17 Jan 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 90653 $"
class ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xmlEV_DIRECTORY_DIALOG
inherit ../interface/ev_standard_dialog.xmlEV_STANDARD_DIALOG redefine ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_standard_dialog.xml#f_make_with_titlemake_with_title
feature -- Access
f_directory../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_directorydirectory: FalseSTRING_32 -- Path of currently selected directory. -- Result is empty if "OK" was not pressed. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do create Result.Falsemake_from_string (../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_pathpath.Falsename) ensure directory_not_void: Result /= Void end
f_path../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_pathpath: FalsePATH -- Path of currently selected directory. -- Result is empty if "OK" was not pressed. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_directory_dialog_i.xml#f_pathpath ensure directory_path_not_void: Result /= Void bridge_ok: Result /= Void implies Result.Falseis_equal (../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_directory_dialog_i.xml#f_pathpath) end
f_start_directory../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_start_directorystart_directory: FalseSTRING_32 -- Base directory where browsing will start. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do create Result.Falsemake_from_string (../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_start_pathstart_path.Falsename) end
f_start_path../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_start_pathstart_path: FalsePATH -- Base directory where browsing will start. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do Result := ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_directory_dialog_i.xml#f_start_pathstart_path ensure bridge_ok: Result.Falseis_equal (../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_directory_dialog_i.xml#f_start_pathstart_path) end
feature -- Element change
f_set_start_directory../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_set_start_directoryset_start_directory (a_path: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_path to ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_start_directorystart_directory. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_path_not_void: a_path /= Void a_path_exists: (create {FalseDIRECTORY}.Falsemake (a_path)).Falseexists do ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_set_start_pathset_start_path (create {FalsePATH}.Falsemake_from_string (a_path)) ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_start_directorystart_directory.Falsesame_string_general (a_path) end
f_set_start_path../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_set_start_pathset_start_path (a_path: FalsePATH) -- Assign a_path to ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_start_pathstart_path. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_path_not_void: a_path /= Void a_path_exists: (create {FalseDIRECTORY}.Falsemake_with_path (a_path)).Falseexists do ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_directory_dialog_i.xml#f_set_start_pathset_start_path (a_path) ensure assigned: ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_start_pathstart_path ~ a_path end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_directory_dialog_i.xmlEV_DIRECTORY_DIALOG_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- See {EV_ANY}.create_implementation. do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_directory_dialog_imp.xmlEV_DIRECTORY_DIALOG_IMP} ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_directory_dialog_imp.xml#f_makemake end

end -- class ../interface/ev_directory_dialog.xmlEV_DIRECTORY_DIALOG
